## help package

</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[HelpBubble](./help.helpbubble.md)


</td><td>

Model representing a scrollable help bubble. Displays a styled title and a list of key binding entries in a scrollable viewport.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[HelpModel](./help.helpmodel.md)


</td><td>

Help view renderer.


</td></tr>
